reviewText: A wonderful overview of this classic sitcom.
Anything with MTM has got to be 5 stars.
Great documentary on MTM.  Any lover of Mary should have for collection
Great tribute to her and a great additional to my library of Mary Tyler Moore shows.
Mary was still alive when this was put out..and has since passed.  This truly is a wonderful celebration to an iconic star.  Wonderful interviews and clips from many productions.

I'M NOT A FAN OF MARY TYLER MOORE BUT I ENJOYED SEEING AND HEARING FROM THE CO-STARS.  SHE HAD A LOT OF FUNNY PEOPLE ALL AROUND HER BUT SHE ISN'T FUNNY HERSELF.  WITHOUT THE CO-STARS, HER SHOW WOULDN'T HAVE MADE IT

Just wanted more..I felt there could have been a more comprehensive coverage of her career and life although it was well presented with some great comments from other actors Mary had worked with. A little too little when it could have been a real celebration.
What a great DVD - a must for all MTM fans.
she is an american treasure & I loved this retraspective
